type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Menace
[i]Impenetrable[/i] – Whenever another creature you control enters, you may create a Spy Role token attached to that creature. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has skulk)[/i]
[i]Armads[/i] – Whenever an enchanted creature you control dies, surveil 1.
Partner with Eliwood, Marques of Pherae
